                "$fh = fopen(\"file.txt\", \"rb\");\nfseek($fh, 10); // start at offset 10\necho fread($fh, 10); // reads 10 bytes\nfseek($fh, 10, SEEK_CUR); // skip 10 bytes\necho fread($fh, 10); // read 10 bytes\nfseek($fh, -10, SEEK_END); // skip to 10 bytes before EOF\necho fread($fh, 10); // read 10 bytes\nfclose($fh);"

        "role": "comment_only",
        "value": {
          "alive": true,
          "created_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_table": "notion_user",
          "created_time": 1552022665284,
          "id": "a4fc1d6c-b4f0-43d0-9610-9daf8a6683d2",
          "ignore_block_count": true,
          "last_edited_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_table": "notion_user",
          "last_edited_time": 1552022665284,
          "parent_id": "c5f1110a-d581-4e2c-b89b-b0160b3f788b",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "title": [
              ["Mode | Description |\nâ€”: | :â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“ |"],
              ["r", [["c"]]],
              [
                " | Open in read only mode, starting at the beginning of the file |"
              ],
              ["r+", [["c"]]],
              [
                " | Open for reading and writing, starting at the beginning of the file |"
              ],
              ["w", [["c"]]],
              [
                " | open for writing only, starting at the beginning of the file. If the file exists it will empty the file. If it doesnâ€™t exist it will attempt to create it. |"
              ],
              ["w+", [["c"]]],
              [
                " | open for reading and writing, starting at the beginning of the file. If the file exists it will empty the file. If it doesnâ€™t exist it will attempt to create it. |"
              ],
              ["a", [["c"]]],
              [
                " | open a file for writing only, starting at the end of the file. If the file does not exist, it will try to create it |"
              ],
              ["a+", [["c"]]],
              [
                " | open a file for reading and writing, starting at the end of the file. If the file does not exist, it will try to create it |"
              ],
              ["x", [["c"]]],
              [
                " | create and open a file for writing only. If the file exists the "
              ],
              ["fopen", [["c"]]],
              [" call will fail |"],
              ["x+", [["c"]]],
              [
                " | create and open a file for reading and writing. If the file exists the "
              ],
              ["fopen", [["c"]]],
              [" call will fail |"],
              ["c", [["c"]]],
              [
                " | open the file for writing only. If the file does not exist it will try to create it. It will start writing at the beginning of the file, but will not empty the file ahead of writing |"
              ],
              ["c+", [["c"]]],
              [
                " | open the file for reading and writing. If the file does not exist it will try to create it. It will start writing at the beginning of the file, but will not empty the file ahead of writing |"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "text",
          "version": 1
        }
      },

      "c4313439-b6d7-4295-9f1c-51895226ad0b": {
        "role": "comment_only",
        "value": {
          "alive": true,
          "created_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_table": "notion_user",
          "created_time": 1552022665285,
          "id": "c4313439-b6d7-4295-9f1c-51895226ad0b",
          "ignore_block_count": true,
          "last_edited_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_table": "notion_user",
          "last_edited_time": 1552022665285,
          "parent_id": "c5f1110a-d581-4e2c-b89b-b0160b3f788b",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "title": [
              ["Adding a "],
              ["t", [["c"]]],
              [" behind the mode (e.g.Â "],
              ["a+b", [["c"]]],
              [", "],
              ["wt", [["c"]]],
              [", etc.) in Windows will translate "],
              ["\"\\n\"", [["c"]]],
              [" line endings to "],
              ["\"\\r\\n\"", [["c"]]],
              [" when working with the file. Add "],
              ["b", [["c"]]],
              [
                " behind the mode if this is not intended, especially if it is a binary file."
              ]
            ]
          },
